typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared LakeUsers = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://meetuptunis.dfs.core.windows.net/lake/Curated/20191224/Users.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = "|", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = LakeUsers,
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Source, {{"_CreationDate", type datetime}}),
  #"Removed errors" = Table.RemoveRowsWithErrors(#"Changed column type"),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(#"Removed errors", each ([_DisplayName] <> ""))
in
  #"Filtered rows";
